title: ADVISORY: Background Briefing Call with Senior Administration Official on New CEA Report Measuring Recovery Act Creating, Saving Jobs | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 11, 2009

 



ADVISORY: Background Briefing Call with Senior Administration Official on New CEA Report Measuring Recovery Act Creating, Saving Jobs




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                          May 11, 2009  Background Briefing Call with Senior Administration Official on New CEA Report Measuring Recovery Act Creating, Saving Jobs   WASHINGTON – Today the White House will hold a background conference call with a senior administration official to discuss the new CEA report released today on measuring progress creating and saving jobs under the Recovery Act.    WHEN: TODAY, Monday, May 11, 2009              2:15PM EDT         HOW: To receive dial-in information, please RSVP to press@who.eop.gov
